channel.title: admin on Rishabh Goyal
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Rishabh Goyal

item.description: I am currently working as a Software Engineer at IBM Research Labs in India. My work primarily involves developing artificial conversational agents that can understand and participate in natural language dialogue. I am interested in Computer Vision and Natural Language Processing applications and have experience working on problems in both fields. I graduated from IIT Kanpur in 2018 with a B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering and a minor in Cognitive Science.
